abstract: Simon Cooper will join Standard Chartered in April and serve as chief executive of the corporate and institutional banking unit, its largest business.
snippet: Simon Cooper will join Standard Chartered in April and serve as chief executive of the corporate and institutional banking unit, its largest business.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Standard Chartered, an Asia-focused bank based in London, announced on Thursday that it had hired Simon Cooper, a veteran banker at HSBC, to lead its corporate and institutional banking division.

headline.main: Standard Chartered Hires HSBC Veteran to Run Corporate Bank

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
